name: Kappa-kun to Asobou: Kappa-kun no Ota no Shimikai
overview: (Google Translated from Japanese WiiWare page) The second series of Yomikakase picture book "Kappa-kun and Asobe" series appears on the Wii! "Pleasant to play with kappa-kun" is busy parenting parents to work as parents do not get tired of children It is a moving picture book to stop you. "Aiuei puzzle" for memorizing katakana is also attached. Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection Paid service is also available, and additional material is available as a talent's Tomonori Uchikode narration by Ms. Tsunoda Ryoko. Please use by all means when playing with children.
